metadata.title: CVE-2019-7344 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Reflected XSS exists in ZoneMinder through 1.32.3, allowing an attacker toexecute HTML or JavaScript code in the view 'filter' as it insecurelyprints the 'filter[Name]' (aka Filter name) value on the web page withoutapplying any proper filtration.

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
